definition: marked by ardent or zealous enthusiasm for a cause
details:
adjective
- marked by ardent or zealous enthusiasm for a cause
= synonyms: evangelistic
- of or pertaining to or in keeping with the Christian gospel especially as in the first 4 books of the New Testament
- relating to or being a Christian church believing in personal conversion and the inerrancy of the Bible especially the 4 Gospels
= example: relating to or being a Christian church believing in personal conversion and the inerrancy of the Bible especially the 4 Gospels
